amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to provide direct payments to persons or legal entities with an average adjusted gross income in excess of $1,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 791 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 15. Record Vote Number: 183.

action.text: Amendment SA 791 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6651; text: CR S6651) To prohibit the use of funds to provide direct payments to persons or legal entities with an average adjusted gross income in excess of $1,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 791 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 15. Record Vote Number: 183.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 791 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 15. Record Vote Number: 183.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 791 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
